column3:
Vessels deployed: <Value>IntegerParameter(2)</Value>/<Value>IntegerParameter(3)</Value>
Ceruleum tanks: <Value>IntegerParameter(1)</Value>
Select a submersible.
Outfit and register a submersible. (Dive credits required: <Value>IntegerParameter(1)</Value>)

Vessels deployed: <Value>IntegerParameter(3)</Value>/<Value>IntegerParameter(4)</Value>
<Emphasis><Highlight>StringParameter(1)</Highlight></Emphasis> (Rank: <Value>IntegerParameter(2)</Value>) - Deployed
Voyage complete in <If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(5),0))><Value>IntegerParameter(5)</Value>d <Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(6),0))><Value>IntegerParameter(6)</Value>h <Else/></If><Value>IntegerParameter(7)</Value>m

Names must be formed from alphanumeric characters. The following punctuation marks are also allowed:
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow>'<Indent/>. , : ; ! ? & - _<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
• Double spaces/underscores are not allowed.
• A space cannot be used before or after the name.
• Names consisting solely of punctuation marks are prohibited.

Are you certain you wish to dismantle <Emphasis><Highlight>StringParameter(1)</Highlight></Emphasis>?
<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow>Please note that while submersible components will be returned, your submersible's registration, rank, and accrued experience will be lost.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
To outfit and register a submersible, you must have in your possession the requisite components and dive credits.
<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Dive credits<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.

<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Submersible components<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> can be constructed in your company workshop. Please note that hull, stern, bow, and bridge components are required to outfit a submersible.
You cannot deploy your submersible on subaquatic voyages without ceruleum tanks, which can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.

Upon the completion of a subaquatic voyage, your mammet will provide a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>voyage log<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> detailing the results.
The information contained in this log may prove useful in preparing for your next subaquatic voyage.
Please note that only the log for the previous voyage will be retained.
You cannot repair submersible components without the requisite materials.
